title: Helicopter crashes into Meramec River at Missouri state park; all passengers escape with 'minor injuries'
summary_full: A private helicopter crashed into the Meramec River at Meramec State Park on Thursday afternoon, prompting a rescue operation for its four occupants. Trained swimmers and EMS crews were deployed to the scene, where officials confirmed the incident. The cause of the crash is under investigation, with speculation it may have involved power lines.
